name: Cast Fira against a group of Bloodbones
Buy 99 Faerie Tonics at the Caravan
Get both Healing Helms from treasure chests
Get the party to at least level 25
Learn exactly one status buff spell
No duplicate weapons equipped
Get all of the treasure in the Marsh Cave
Cast Blizzaga at least twice
Defeat 3 groups with 4 different monsters
Get the Ice Brand in Mt. Gulg
Buy 99 Cottages in Gaia
Defeat a Vampire Lord
Use the spell Exit to escape from Mt. Gulg
Get all of the treasure in Mt. Duergar, including Excalibur
Use at least 15 Ethers
Complete the Sunken Shrine without escaping combat
Use zero Thieves
Defeat Echidna in Earthgift Shrine
Obtain a Megalixir, but not from 15-tile puzzle
Get only 1 of Sunblade or Diamond Armor from chests
Defeat Hyenadon
Learn at least one Level 7 spell for a character
Defeat a group with 4 different monsters
Equip only a Thief's Armlet on the body slot
Defeat Two-headed Dragon in Earthgift Shrine
